    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public static void configure(javax.servlet.ServletContextEvent event)
        Initializes log4j logging for the webapp. Reads log4j properties file location from log4jConfigLocation parameter in web.xml. When not using aboslute path, the path starts from the webapp root directory. If the file can't be read, reverts to default configuration file under WEB-INF/classes/pxf-log4j.properties.
        Parameters:
        event - Servlet context, used to determine webapp root directory.
